title: a big reason why ive started playing and enjoying this game less and less every single day
body:
http://prntscr.com/f7vhf2

this is me telling you, your game is what makes people toxic.

this is why im glad i didnt hold back on calling the lucian a little baby that wont stop bitching and the yasuo a fucking asshole who has no respect for anyone but himself.


give me that juicy intentionally feeding yasuo top who i begged to play a bit safer .


i ganked his ass multiple times and begged him to just cool it the hell down and let me help him


my maokai is full ap with no sightstone 30 minutes in constantly getting caught and wasting his ulti to see if it can hit jungle camps.


my lucian went afk 3 times while flaming the living shit out of our team claiming ff @ 20 while hes the only one thats been afking.



im the only one desperately 1v5ing as they all jst pile focus on me and not one enemy teammate called out my team for trolling.

"they arent feeding on purpose lol they are just making mistakes" - the enemy bard that watched as our maokai ran into 4 of them.


thank you riot.

every single day this game pushes me further away from it.


your game is becoming a cess pool of trolls who KNOW they can do whatever the fuck they want and anyone who calls them on it or flames them will be apprehended on the fucking spot.

whoever hired riot lyte needs to get the fuck off this game and look for a degree in autism.

replies.body:
So people show shitty personalities but it's the game's fault, your logic is flawed.


This behavior happens is almost every multiplayer game with chat, stop blaming the game, when is it the players fault for having a bad personality?

people get aggravated when they are stuck in a 30 minute game trying to carry 3 imbeciles trying to int and nothing is done about it ***


people dont come into a video game to flame but rather get pissed off when all their time is being wasted because the punishment system is designed to punish bad words over actual people ruining the game**


would rather 5 million people flame the living shit out of me in game wishing death upon my mother over 1 guy intentionally feeding because atleast with the flamers, they want to win******

So back to what i said, when is it the players fault (that means everyone involved). 

Are you being forced to flame them, are they being forced to int and be idiots? No, so why is it the game's fault?

If you can give me a logical explanation, all power to you and you can be correct... until then, you're just ranting about false things.

when the game is completely out of my hand and im watching 3 worthless human beings do nothing but make the game harder for everyone on purpose, i will call them out on it.


its the games fault because IM STUCK WITH THESE MORONS.

im the one that cant leave and ironically enough IM THE ONLY ONE that even wants to win.

if the game was designed to help out the players rather than put a gate around them and leave them to run rampant, it would be in a much healthier state.

Only thing you are pointing out is human errors of the players in the game. since there's no way to tell how a person is every game out of millions of people. Because they can have good games and bad games while at the same time not being reported when inting or being reported when being perfect.


Stop blaming the game.

They all built fine. I had a really shitty ranked day where I lost all my games and there were a surprising amount of afks and ragequitters in those games. I kept my mouth shut and came on the boards and cried about it instead. No ban for me. The next day I had better teammates and won a majority of my games performing the same as I did those other days. But I recognize that I did indeed have a good day. They're not all bad. I control myself as best I can and so far I haven't been punished.

my yasuo was diving a 4-0 fiora when he was 0-4 over and over.

told him fighting her wouldnt work out and him dying to her would only make it harder on him and he responded by diving and feeding her once more.


this was an intentional feeder.


my adc was afk for 5 minutes and had a chat log of him flaming everyone while he spammed the ff vote.


my support was building full ap and we had no sightstone for 30 minutes and continued to get caught over and over.


thanks.


"bad game"
People only feed for a reaction. I don't think they enjoy just walking into towers. They enjoy what you say to them after they walk into towers. Take away their enjoyment and don't say anything.
You know Lyte doesn't work with Riot anymore, right....

^^^

Even if I've had games where I played like ass and my teammates told me "kys" I have this beautiful tool called a mute button.

If you muted the dudes Skyphic was talking about, it wouldn't change the yas inting, the afk lucian, or diving maokai. If those guys threw the game over someone saying mean things to them, I say too fkn bad they should've straightened up hit mute and continued to play like they wanted to win. If they aren't doing that, then they shouldn't even be on the rift. Everyone loses, but right now losing doesn't give you the sense of "man we all played but couldn't pull it through". The game right now is more roll the dice and see who gets the unbanned troll. Trolls aren't trolls cuz they may or may not talk shit; they're trolls cuz they don't actually play the game once in it for X reason and are wasting everyone's time. Reports should be focused on actions, not some dipshits feelings about what some stranger said. Was he controlling your buttons? Did you have a mute option? Then stfu and if you're bad get better or get used to muting when you play. I'd take 4 assholes who say ridiculously offensive stuff over 4 tilted players who are just gonna throw at first death or at first insult any day.
